languages.text: The Ecclesiarchy, known formally as the Adeptus Ministorum, is a vast institution that oversees the galaxy-spanning religion of the Imperium. The Ecclesiarchy's complex hierarchies of cardinals, missionaries, preachers, and zealous laity ensure the prescribed prayers and invocations are made, all the while instructing the masses to guard against heresy and deviancy. You used to be one of those fiery and charismatic individuals concerned with keeping a close watch on your congregation.
languages.original_text: Экклезиархия (официальное название — Адептус Министорум) — это огромная организация, осуществляющая контроль над религиозной жизнью Империума в масштабах галактики. Сложная иерархическая система, включающая кардиналов, миссионеров, проповедников и фанатично преданных мирян, следит за проведением предписанных молебнов и дает наставления всему населению по защите от ереси и инакомыслия. Вы входили в число ярких одухотворенных личностей Министорума, уделявших своей пастве самое пристальное внимание.

languages.text: Die Ekklesiarchie, offiziell als Adeptus Ministorum bekannt, ist eine riesige Institution, welche die galaxieumspannende Religion des Imperiums überwacht. Die komplexen Hierarchien der Ekklesiarchie, bestehend aus Kardinälen, Missionaren, Predigern und eifrigen Laien, sorgen dafür, dass die vorgeschriebenen Gebete und Anrufungen durchgeführt werden, und weisen die Massen gleichzeitig an, sich vor Ketzerei und Abtrünnigkeit zu hüten. Früher warst du eine dieser feurigen und charismatischen Persönlichkeiten, die ihre Gemeinde genau im Auge behielten.

languages.text: L'Ecclésiarchie, connue officiellement sous le nom d'Adeptus Ministorum, est une vaste institution qui supervise la religion de l'Imperium à l'échelle de la galaxie. La hiérarchie complexe de l'Ecclésiarchie, composée de cardinaux, de missionnaires, de prédicateurs et de laïcs zélés, permet de veiller au respect des prières et des invocations prescrites, tout en montrant aux masses comment se préserver de l'hérésie et des comportements déviants. Vous avez été l'un de ces individus impétueux et charismatiques soucieux de surveiller de près sa congrégation.
languages.original_text: The Ecclesiarchy, known formally as the Adeptus Ministorum, is a vast institution that oversees the galaxy-spanning religion of the Imperium. The Ecclesiarchy's complex hierarchies of cardinals, missionaries, preachers, and zealous laity ensure the prescribed prayers and invocations are made, all the while instructing the masses to guard against heresy and deviancy. You used to be one of those fiery and charismatic individuals concerned with keeping a close watch on your congregation.

traits.locale_text: L'Ecclésiarchie, connue officiellement sous le nom d'Adeptus Ministorum, est une vaste institution qui supervise la religion de l'Imperium à l'échelle de la galaxie. La hiérarchie complexe de l'Ecclésiarchie, composée de cardinaux, de missionnaires, de prédicateurs et de laïcs zélés, permet de veiller au respect des prières et des invocations prescrites, tout en montrant aux masses comment se préserver de l'hérésie et des comportements déviants. languages.text: 帝国国教是个庞大的机构，负责管理整个银河系的帝国宗教组织。帝国国教由红衣主教、传教士、布道士，以及虔诚的普通人组成。国教结构复杂，负责确保所有人执行帝国要求的祈祷与祈求仪式，同时指引普通人防范异端分子与邪教徒。您曾经也是这样一个充满热情与魅力的人，关注着您的教众。
languages.original_text: The Ecclesiarchy, known formally as the Adeptus Ministorum, is a vast institution that oversees the galaxy-spanning religion of the Imperium. The Ecclesiarchy's complex hierarchies of cardinals, missionaries, preachers, and zealous laity ensure the prescribed prayers and invocations are made, all the while instructing the masses to guard against heresy and deviancy. You used to be one of those fiery and charismatic individuals concerned with keeping a close watch on your congregation.

traits.locale_text: 帝国国教是个庞大的机构，负责管理整个银河系的帝国宗教组织。帝国国教由红衣主教、传教士、布道士，以及虔诚的普通人组成。国教结构复杂，负责确保所有人执行帝国要求的祈祷与祈求仪式，同时指引普通人防范异端分子与邪教徒。您曾经也是这样一个充满热情与魅力的人，关注着您的教众。

languages.text: La Eclesiarquía, oficialmente designada el Adeptus Ministorum, es la inmensa institución que supervisa la religión galáctica del Imperium. La compleja jerarquía de cardenales, misioneros, predicadores y laicos fervorosos que forma la Eclesiarquía se asegura de que se celebran las plegarias e invocaciones pertinentes a la vez que animan a las masas a protegerse contra la herejía y la degeneración. Solías estar entre sus representantes, vigilando estrechamente a tu congregación.
languages.original_text: The Ecclesiarchy, known formally as the Adeptus Ministorum, is a vast institution that oversees the galaxy-spanning religion of the Imperium. The Ecclesiarchy's complex hierarchies of cardinals, missionaries, preachers, and zealous laity ensure the prescribed prayers and invocations are made, all the while instructing the masses to guard against heresy and deviancy. You used to be one of those fiery and charismatic individuals concerned with keeping a close watch on your congregation.

traits.locale_text: La Eclesiarquía, oficialmente designada el Adeptus Ministorum, es la inmensa institución que supervisa la religión galáctica del Imperium. La compleja jerarquía de cardenales, misioneros, predicadores y laicos fervorosos que forma la Eclesiarquía se asegura de que se celebran las plegarias e invocaciones pertinentes a la vez que animan a las masas a protegerse contra la herejía y la degeneración. Solías estar entre sus representantes, vigilando estrechamente a tu congregación.

languages.text: 正式には帝国宗務局として知られる帝国聖教会（エクレシアーキー）は、帝国の銀河にまたがる宗教を監督する巨大な機関だ。枢機卿、宣教師、伝道師、熱心な信徒からなる帝国聖教会（エクレシアーキー）の複雑なヒエラルキーは、異端や逸脱を防ぐために大衆を導きながら、定められた祈祷が確実に行われることを可能としている。あなたは、かつてそこに属していた熱狂的かつカリスマ的な人物であり、信徒たちを見守っていた。
languages.original_text: The Ecclesiarchy, known formally as the Adeptus Ministorum, is a vast institution that oversees the galaxy-spanning religion of the Imperium. The Ecclesiarchy's complex hierarchies of cardinals, missionaries, preachers, and zealous laity ensure the prescribed prayers and invocations are made, all the while instructing the masses to guard against heresy and deviancy. You used to be one of those fiery and charismatic individuals concerned with keeping a close watch on your congregation.

traits.locale_text: 正式には帝国宗務局（アデプトゥス・ミニストルム）として知られる帝国聖教会（エクレシアーキー）は、帝国の銀河にまたがる宗教を監督する巨大な機関だ。枢機卿、宣教師、伝道師、熱心な信徒からなる帝国聖教会（エクレシアーキー）の複雑なヒエラルキーは、異端や逸脱を防ぐために大衆を導きながら、定められた祈祷が確実に行われることを可能としている。あなたは、かつてそこに属していた熱狂的かつカリスマ的な人物であり、信徒たちを見守っていた。

languages.text: Resmî adıyla Adeptus Ministorum olarak bilinen Ekleşiarşi, galaksiye yayılmış İmparatorluk dinini idare eden devasa bir kurumdur. Ekleşiarşi'nin kardinaller, misyonerler, vaizler ve sofu dindarlardan oluşan karmaşık hiyerarşisi; bir yandan yapılması buyrulan dua ve ayinlerin icrasını temin ederken bir yandan da kitlelere kâfirlik ve sapkınlıktan korunmayı öğretir. Eskiden sen de cemaatini yakından takip etmekle meşgul olan bu ateşli ve karizmatik şahsiyetlerden biriydin.
languages.original_text: The Ecclesiarchy, known formally as the Adeptus Ministorum, is a vast institution that oversees the galaxy-spanning religion of the Imperium. The Ecclesiarchy's complex hierarchies of cardinals, missionaries, preachers, and zealous laity ensure the prescribed prayers and invocations are made, all the while instructing the masses to guard against heresy and deviancy. You used to be one of those fiery and charismatic individuals concerned with keeping a close watch on your congregation.
